short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide job application links on KeyValues.com that return a 404

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't waste time clicking Apply buttons on KeyValues.com that take you to a 404 page. This extension will replace all invalid Apply buttons with "Application unavailable" text on page load.
